# Exploratory Data Analysis {.tabset .tabset-fade}
Words

### How many conjunction events have 0 Probability of Collision within a day of TCA?
```{r EDA1, echo=FALSE}

load("data/concernData.RData")

# How many are 0?
zeroCount <- merge(
  concernSummary[Pc_min==0,.(Zero_count=.N),by=fragNum],
  concernSummary[,.(Total=.N),by=fragNum],
  by="fragNum")
zeroCount[,"Proportion" := round(Zero_count/Total,3)]
zeroCount <- zeroCount[,!"Total"]
zeroCount %>% formattable(align="l") %>% as.htmlwidget(width=250)
```
Results explanation


### How many events of concern if the threshold is 1e-5?
```{r EDA2, echo=FALSE}
# How many concern events at varying frag numbers values?
concernCount <- merge(
  concernSummary[Pc_min >= 1e-5,.(Concern_Event_Count=.N),by=fragNum],
  concernSummary[,.(Total=.N),by=fragNum]
)
concernCount$Proportion <- formatC(concernCount$Concern_Event_Count/concernCount$Total,
                                   format="e",digits=2)
concernCount[,!"Total"] %>% formattable(align="l") %>% 
  as.htmlwidget(width=250)# Frag 10000 has no concern events

```

Results explanation
